name: DenverNuggets

”Alexa, open the Nuggets”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nuggets
Developer Terms of Use
des: The official Denver Nuggets skill is your guide to every NBA season. Whether you’re looking for a recap of last night’s action, or looking for the Nuggets' next game and how to watch it, this skill has you covered. You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Nuggets' current conference standing!
